field.name: description
field.title: Auction Description
field.comment: Full description of auction. Text and html allowed.

field.name: start_date
field.title: Auction Start Date
field.comment: Date and time the auction starts.

field.name: end_date
field.title: Auction End Date
field.comment: Date and time the auction ends. May be NULL if no defined end date/time

field.name: item_start_date
field.title: Item registration Start Date
field.comment: Date and time that users can add item.

field.name: item_end_date
field.title: Item registration End Date
field.comment: Date and time that item registration ends. May be NULL if no defined end date/time

field.name: is_approval_needed
field.title: Do items need to be approved?
field.comment: If true all items needs to be approved before appearing on the auction pages.

field.name: is_item_groups
field.title: Can items be grouped?
field.comment: If true multiple items can be consolidated into one item group.

field.name: max_items
field.title: Max Auction items
field.comment: Maximum number of items that can be added to the auction.

field.name: max_items_user
field.comment: Maximum number of items that can be added to the auction per user.

field.name: event_id
field.comment: Event this auction is linked to

field.name: donor_profile_id
field.comment: Profile to be used for donor account creation.

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this Auction enabled or disabled/cancelled?
